com.mygdx.game.ui

Class UIBattleStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.ui.UIComponent
      • com.mygdx.game.ui.UIBattleStatus

  • public class UIBattleStatus
extends UIComponent
    Represents the party's status display during battle.

        paddingY - vertical text padding
